ygData.subject: Re: Adventure Stone?
ygData.msgSnippet: You have to go to the city you started in and you should hear a second voice.  If you ve managed to piss them off you can got to WK near the undead camp or
ygData.messageBody:
You have to go to the city you started in and you should hear a
second voice. If you've managed to piss them off you can got to WK
near the undead camp or Rathe Mtns at the Gypses. They will tell you
who to talk to and what to say. Then find the Wayfarer camp you were
directed to and your in!

Good luck. My low level alt have no trouble in LDoN. Of course he's
a Troll Warrior!

Tuldayen Grimblade
Pathfinder of Tunare
Terris-Thule, Summoners of the Realm.

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Nefrahari@a... wrote:
> I'm hoping someone can remind me about this... I got the LDoN
message about
> who to speak to for the adventure stone when I was level 16, and
since I wasn't
> at 20 yet, I didn't do it. Now that I'm at 22, I can't remember who
it was I
> was supposed to talk to. Who is the person in Halas that gives you
the stone?
>
> Jenn
>
> "Sail to your heart's desires, and know when to drop anchor."
